.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchemaBindableMapper GetSchemaBindableMapper(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IPredictor predictor, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IComponentFactory`2<class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IPredictor, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchemaBindableMapper> mapperFactory, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.CommandLine.ICommandLineComponentFactory scorerFactorySettings) cil managed

Public Shared Function GetSchemaBindableMapper (env As IHostEnvironment, predictor As IPredictor, Optional mapperFactory As IComponentFactory(Of IPredictor, ISchemaBindableMapper) = null, Optional scorerFactorySettings As ICommandLineComponentFactory = null) As ISchemaBindableMapper

Docs.summary: Given a predictor, an optional mapper factory, and an optional scorer factory settings, produces a compatible ISchemaBindableMapper. First, it tries to instantiate the bindable mapper using the mapper factory. Next, it tries to instantiate the bindable mapper using the (this will only succeed if there's a registered BindableMapper creation method with load name equal to the one of the scorer). If the above fails, it checks whether the predictor implements directly. If this also isn't true, it will create a 'matching' standard mapper.

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IComponentFactory`4<class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchemaBoundMapper, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.RoleMappedSchema, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataScorerTransform> GetScorerComponent(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment environment, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchemaBoundMapper mapper, string suffix) cil managed

Public Shared Function GetScorerComponent (environment As IHostEnvironment, mapper As ISchemaBoundMapper, Optional suffix As String = null) As IComponentFactory(Of IDataView, ISchemaBoundMapper, RoleMappedSchema, IDataScorerTransform)

Docs.param: The schema bound mapper to get the default scorer.
An optional suffix to append to the default column names.
Docs.summary: Determine the default scorer for a schema bound mapper. This looks for text-valued ScoreColumnKind metadata on the first column of the mapper. If that text is found and maps to a scorer loadable class, that component is used. Otherwise, the GenericScorer is used.
